About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm Vipul Bhatt, a dedicated and passionate final-year B.Tech Computer Science student at Graphic Era Hill University, Dehradun. I completed my schooling at St. Don Bosco Sr. Sec. School, and I’ve always been driven by a deep interest in web development—creating visually appealing, responsive, and functional web experiences.

To complement my development skills, I actively engage in problem-solving and competitive programming. I’m proud to be a 4-star coder on HackerRank and currently hold the 15th rank in my institute on GeeksforGeeks, reflecting my consistent dedication to sharpening my coding abilities. My curiosity in emerging technologies recently led me to explore Generative AI. I developed a project that leverages LLMs (Large Language Models) to assist in medical diagnosis, particularly predicting Type 2 Diabetes from clinical text data—showcasing the real-world impact of AI in healthcare. Beyond academics and projects, I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading about industry trends, and continuously improving my skills. I believe in balancing productivity with personal growth, and I’m committed to staying updated with the evolving landscape of tech. As I move forward, my goal is to build user-centric digital solutions that are not only technically sound but also meaningful and impactful.

Web Developer

Full Stack Developer

Created AI T-Shirt Customization Platform Built using React.js, Three.js, and TailwindCSS, integrated with OpenAI DALL·E for AI-generated designs, featuring color selection, image upload, and design download functionality. Created an E-commerce Website developed a feature-rich store with React, Sanity CMS, and Stripe for secure payments, focusing on seamless product management and user experience.

Generative AI

LLM-based Medical Diagnosis Project

I developed a Generative AI project that uses Large Language Models (LLMs) to analyze clinical text data and assist in diagnosing Type 2 Diabetes. The system processes patient medical reports and predicts diabetes risk, showcasing the potential of LLMs in healthcare applications. This project deepened my understanding of prompt engineering, model integration, and building real-world AI-powered solutions.

Coder

Achieving a 15th institute rank on GeeksforGeeks, a 4-star rating on HackerRank, Level 6 on Coding Ninjas, and active participation on Codeforces reflects my strong commitment to continuous learning and competitive programming. These milestones demonstrate my proficiency in data structures, algorithms, and various programming languages. Through consistent practice across these platforms, I’ve solved numerous coding challenges—sharpening my ability to write clean, efficient, and scalable code, while approaching complex problems with logic, creativity, and precision.
